Hospital.Controllers

Class MachineController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Controllers.MachineController

  • public class MachineController
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to perform Machine-related actions. This controller enables the following usecase: Create new machine

    • Method Detail

      • makeMachine

        public java.lang.String makeMachine(java.lang.String machineType,
                           java.lang.String id,
                           Location location,
                           CampusInfo info)
                             throws NotAFactoryException,
                                    NotLoggedInException,
                                    WrongArgumentListException,
                                    SchedulableAlreadyExistsException,
                                    InvalidArgumentException,
                                    CannotChangeException
        Makes a machine of the given type.
        Parameters:
        machine - the type of machine to create
        argv - the arguments for the creation of this machine
        Returns:
        the details of the newly created machine
        Throws:
        NotAFactoryException - an invalid type of machine was given
        NotLoggedInException - the administrator is not logged in
        WrongArgumentListException - the given arguments do not match the type of machine
        SchedulableAlreadyExistsException - this machine already exists in the world
        InvalidArgumentException - thrown if the list or one of the arguments is null, or if the answer does not satisfy the constraints.
        CannotChangeException

      • getAvailableMachineFactories

        public java.lang.String[] getAvailableMachineFactories()
        Gets the available types of machines that can be created.
        Returns:
        an array of strings containing the names of machines
